name: NotePad
tagline:
I made the NotePad application to get to know Java, XML, Android SDK, and mobile development in general. It 
      is a text saving application for Android devices. It is simple, easy to use, and is integrated with your other 
      applications so that you can share your text by GMail, Facebook, and Twitter, to name but a few. The code for it
      can be downloaded off of GitHub or below.
body:
### Demo
Below are some screenshots taken from the NotePad app. They show its interface and functions, starting with the main page and going through the steps 
      of making, working on, saving, sharing, and deleting a note.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
